title: The Business plan
creator_credit: Paul Humfress, Geoffrey Barnes and Film Australia
brief_description: To succeed in an ever-increasing technologically oriented world, a business plan is needed. This provides the parameters for basic planning and acts as a stimulant for the viewer to ask the right questions and seek the right answers in an authentic business environment. It is of particular interest to owner/managers of small manufacturing businesses.
